A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

Once it becomes an
adult, it has a
tendency to let its comrades plant
footprints on its
back.

The color of the
mysterious fluid
secreted from its tail is predeter
mined for each
SMEARGLE.

territory using a body fluid that leaks
out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this
POKMON have been found.

Arriv  lge adulte, il laisse ses camarades poser

Ist es erwachsen, lsst es sich gern von seinen

Quando  adulto tende a farsi lasciare orme di zampe
sul dorso dai propri compagni.

Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let
its comrades plant footprints on its back.

Queulorior dlimite son territoire en librant un fluide corporel
qui sort de sa queue. On a dcouvert plus de 5000 traces
diffrentes de fluide laisses par ce Pokmon.

On reconnat les villes peuples de nombreux

Nelle citt che ospitano molti Smeargle, i muri

It draws symbols all over the place to mark its
territory. In towns with many Smeargle, the walls
are covered in graffiti.

La teinte du liquide qui coule de sa queue varie
en fonction de son humeur.

Der Farbton der Flssigkeit, die aus seiner

The fluid of Smeargles tail secretions changes
in the intensity of its hue as the Pokmons
emotions change.

Il se sert du liquide qui sort de sa queue pour
dessiner sa marque. Ses fans sarrachent ses
plus beaux tracs  prix dor.

Mit der Flssigkeit, die aus seiner Schweifspitze

Dibuja marcas con el lquido que secreta por la

Traccia dei segni con il fluido prodotto dalla

It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from
the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol,
Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.
